name: DARKEST CORNERS
description:
THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHY IMAGES 

Made specifically for Weekly Game Jam - Week 182
Jam theme: 'Cthulhu'

Short (about 2-4 minutes) horror visual novel game.

Controls:

 E - skip message

LMB - Interact

Checkout my other games: https://yalokin92.itch.io/sacred-family

UPDATE V0.2

- Text boxes are BIGGER now

- Added a button for those who dont want SCREAMERS!(YOU CAN TURN OFF JUMPSCARES SIMPLY BY CLICKING "SCREAMERS" BUTTON)

P.S. Old version of the game are also avaible for download.(just in case)
